title: Word of Recall
data:
{{version030}}

'''Word of Recall''' is monsters-only spell which teleports a random band of human intelligence creatures to the caster. The spell takes 30 [[aut]]s to fully cast, however, so if you can disable the caster, the spell will not take effect. It is also subject to a [[breath]] timer, so it cannot be cast repeatedly. The following methods allow you to interrupt Word of Recall:
*[[Silence]] and [[Waterlog]]
*[[Engulf]]-flavour attacks (such as from a [[water elemental]])
*[[Yara's Violent Unravelling]]
*[[Paralysis]]
*[[Confusion]]
*[[Frenzy]]
*[[Cause Fear|Fear]]
*[[Sleep]], through [[Ensorcelled Hibernation]] or otherwise
*Full [[petrification]]
*A [[wand of polymorph]]
*Killing the caster

{{monsters with spell}}

It can also be cast on you as an effect of a [[Zot trap]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], this spell couldn't be interrupted by [[Yara's Violent Unravelling]].
*Prior to [[0.17]], [[curare]] had an asphyxiation effect that could block or interrupt Word of Recall. 
*Prior to [[0.14]], this spell had no breath timer.
*Word of Recall was added in [[0.12]].
